reviewText: It would not play in our "region" what ever that means. Would like our money back, but can't find the vendor.

It is a story about a mom and her daughters living in another country where she meets a man and forms a torrid relationship with him. He shows her life in his country and she and her daughters love it. I read about the movie in a book sold on Amazon.com titled THE DEFINITIVE GUIDE TO GIRLS IN COMING OF AGE MOVIES 2015. It lists and has descriptions for over 600 similar movies.
When I tried to play the movie it said it was not formatted for my region.  The movie I received was formatted for Australia.
